verses.verse: <S%H4905>Maschil<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> have you <S%H2186>cast<s%> us off for <S%H5331>ever?<s%> why does your <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H6225>smoke<s%> against the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of your <S%H4830>pasture?<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> your <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> which you have <S%H7069>purchased<s%> of <S%H6924>old;<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> which you have <S%H1350>redeemed;<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> wherein you have <S%H7931>dwelled.<s%>

<S%H7311>Lift<s%> up your <S%H6471>feet<s%> to the <S%H5331>perpetual<s%> <S%H4876>desolations;<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H341>enemy<s%> has done <S%H7489>wickedly<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
Your <S%H6887>enemies<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of your <S%H4150>congregations;<s%> they <S%H7760>set<s%> up their <S%H226>ensigns<s%> for <S%H226>signs.<s%>
A man was <S%H3045>famous<s%> according as he had <S%H935>lifted<s%> up <S%H7134>axes<s%> on the <S%H5441>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees.<s%>
But <S%H6258>now<s%> they <S%H1986>break<s%> down the <S%H6603>carved<s%> <S%H6603>work<s%> thereof <S%H3162>at<s%> once with <S%H3781>axes<s%> and <S%H3597>hammers.<s%>

They have <S%H7971>cast<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> into your <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> they have <S%H2490>defiled<s%> by casting down the <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> place of your <S%H8034>name<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> in their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> Let us <S%H3238>destroy<s%> them <S%H3162>together:<s%> they have <S%H8313>burned<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4150>synagogues<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

We <S%H7200>see<s%> not our <S%H226>signs:<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> any <S%H5030>prophet:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is there <S%H854>among<s%> us any that <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long.<s%>

O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> <S%H2778>reproach?<s%> shall the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H5006>blaspheme<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5331>ever?<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H7725>withdraw<s%> you your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> even your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand?<s%> <S%H3615>pluck<s%> it out of your <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>
For <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> <S%H6466>working<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
You did <S%H6565>divide<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by your <S%H5797>strength:<s%> you <S%H7665>brake<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H8577>dragons<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

You <S%H7533>brake<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> in pieces, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him to be <S%H3978>meat<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6728>inhabiting<s%> the <S%H6728>wilderness.<s%>
You did <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H4599>fountain<s%> and the <S%H5158>flood:<s%> you <S%H3001>dried<s%> up <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
The <S%H3117>day<s%> is yours, the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> is yours: you have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H3974>light<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>
You have <S%H5324>set<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1367>borders<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> you have <S%H3335>made<s%> <S%H7019>summer<s%> and <S%H2779>winter.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> that the <S%H341>enemy<s%> has <S%H2778>reproached,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and that the <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H5006>blasphemed<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

O <S%H5414>deliver<s%> not the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of your <S%H8449>turtledove<s%> to the <S%H2416>multitude<s%> of the wicked: <S%H7911>forget<s%> not the <S%H2416>congregation<s%> of your <S%H6041>poor<s%> for <S%H5331>ever.<s%>
Have <S%H5027>respect<s%> to the <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> for the <S%H4285>dark<s%> places of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of <S%H2555>cruelty.<s%>
O let not the <S%H1790>oppressed<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3637>ashamed:<s%> let the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7378>plead<s%> your own <S%H7379>cause:<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> how the <S%H5036>foolish<s%> man <S%H2781>reproaches<s%> you <S%H3605>daily.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
<S%H7911>Forget<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H6887>enemies:<s%> the <S%H7588>tumult<s%> of those that <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against you <S%H5927>increases<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
